programme.title: Champagne in paradise
programme.desc: A group of friends experiences a life-changing journey filled with humor, romance, and life lessons.

programme.title: The Killer Reserved Nine Seats
programme.desc: Patrick Davenant invites a group of friends and his daughter to his family-owned theater. Within a short time, the guests realize that they are trapped. A masked killer begins to murder them one by one.

programme.title: The Clan
programme.desc: Franco and Dino, two mechanics from Rome, leave for Las Vegas to participate in the Harley-Davidson world meeting. They count on winning the reward provided for participants. But their real big dream is different. It is music. The two of them sing and dance to pieces by Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin without thinking that this could become a profession.

programme.title: Poker in bed
programme.desc: Love, rivalry, and high-stakes games mix in a witty tale of ambition and seduction

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: Marco Bocci's directorial debut, based on his book of the same name. In the tough Roman neighbourhood of Tor Bella Monaca, Mauro, recently left by his girlfriend, is about to discover whether being evil is something one is born with or something one becomes.

programme.title: Thieves and Robbers
programme.desc: A playboy who makes a living out of seducing women and stealing their jewellery accidentally witnesses a Mafia murder. He must work together with the man who is constantly trying to catch him, Lt. Alan Parker, in order to save his life.

programme.title: Mallory must not die!
programme.desc: A gripping thriller about Mallory, whose life becomes a dangerous pursuit after a fatal encounter.

programme.title: My Name Is Rocco Papaleo
programme.desc: Rocco Papaleo, an optimistic and kind man from a mining town in Alaska, gets away from his company during a trip to Chicago and is increasingly disillusioned in the face of the city's hostility.

programme.title: The Inglorious Bastards
programme.desc: The cult film that inspired Tarantino. Two men form an unusual friendship in an attempt to avoid death during World War II.

programme.title: Rulers of the City
programme.desc: Ric is a boy trying to avenge his father who was treacherously murdered, after a robbery, by a mafioso called Lo sfregiato who monopolises all the illegal activities in Rome. Ric, after meeting Tony in the service of a small-time mafia boss, Luigi Cerchio, and skilled with a gun, manages to get his help.

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: Marco Bocci's directorial debut, based on his book of the same name. In the tough Roman neighbourhood of Tor Bella Monaca, Mauro, recently left by his girlfriend, is about to discover whether being evil is something one is born with or something one becomes.

programme.title: Thieves and Robbers
programme.desc: A playboy who makes a living out of seducing women and stealing their jewellery accidentally witnesses a Mafia murder. He must work together with the man who is constantly trying to catch him, Lt. Alan Parker, in order to save his life.

programme.title: Mallory must not die!
programme.desc: A gripping thriller about Mallory, whose life becomes a dangerous pursuit after a fatal encounter.
